Class BitcoinCLITool

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolProvider
    public class BitcoinCLITool
extends BaseJsonRpcTool
    An attempt at cloning the bitcoin-cli tool, but using Java and bitcoinj

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        main method for bitcoinj-cli tool. See BitcoinRpcCliOptions for options and https://bitcoin.org/en/developer-reference#bitcoin-core-apis[Bitcoin Core JSON-RPC API] for the methods and parameters. Users can use `-?` to get general help or help _command_ to get help on a specific command.
        Parameters:
        args - options, JSON-RPC method, JSON-RPC parameters
